competitors.name: Juniper Networks
competitors.notes: Key competitor specializing in networking products, focus on high-performance networking and automation

competitors.name: Huawei
competitors.notes: Formidable competitor known for cost-effective solutions, significant market share in emerging markets

competitors.name: Arista Networks
competitors.notes: Focuses on high-speed datacenter and cloud networking, products compete directly with Cisco's Nexus and Catalyst switches

competitors.name: HPE Aruba
competitors.notes: Major SD-WAN player with Edge Services Platform analyzing telemetry data

competitors.name: Dell
competitors.notes: Stronger competitor after parting from VMware, has 20,000 data center customers, PowerSwitch supports own NOS and third-party NOSes

competitors.name: Palo Alto Networks
competitors.notes: Leading competitor in cybersecurity offering Next-Generation Firewall (NGFW)

competitors.name: Check Point
competitors.notes: Pioneer in cybersecurity with AI-powered cyber protection

competitors.name: Amazon Web Services (AWS)
competitors.notes: Cloud computing platform offering wide range of services

context: In 2024, Cisco faces intense competition across networking, cybersecurity, and cloud. Arista is strong in data center switches. Dell is emerging as stronger competitor leveraging 20,000 data center customers.
